pullrequest.title: Move functions that use TinyXML symbols to private headers

content.raw: I just noticed that all the function are just using pointer to TinyXML classes: an alternative approach could be to forward declare those classes to remove the inclusion of tinyxml headers and deprecate this functions, to then remove them in the next release.
content.html: I just noticed that all the function are just using pointer to TinyXML classes: an alternative approach could be to forward declare those classes to remove the inclusion of tinyxml headers and deprecate this functions, to then remove them in the next release.
